tool_description: Identifies potential duplicate candidate profiles by comparing contact information, education, experience, and other identifying details.

candidate_profile.description: JSON string of the candidate profile to check for duplicates

existing_profiles_db.description: Array of JSON strings representing existing candidate profiles

similarity_threshold.description: Minimum similarity score (0-1) to flag as potential duplicate

match_criteria.description: Criteria to use for matching: email, phone, name, education, experience

fuzzy_matching.description: Enable fuzzy string matching for names and other text fields

error_messages: Invalid candidate profile: candidate_profile must be a valid JSON string with required fields.
Empty existing profiles: existing_profiles_db must contain at least one profile for comparison.
Invalid similarity threshold: similarity_threshold must be between 0 and 1.
Invalid match criteria: Use valid criteria from [email, phone, name, education, experience].
JSON parsing error: One or more profiles contain invalid JSON format.
usage: Provide the candidate_profile to check and existing_profiles_db to compare against. Configure similarity_threshold and match_criteria based on your duplicate detection requirements. Enable fuzzy_matching for more flexible name matching.

is_duplicate.description: Whether the candidate appears to be a duplicate

duplicate_matches.description: IDs or identifiers of potentially matching profiles

similarity_scores.description: Similarity scores for each potential match

match_reasons.description: Specific fields that triggered the duplicate detection

confidence_level.description: Confidence level of duplicate detection (high, medium, low)
